channel.title: What file do i open to change where you start out when you first log in?
channel.description:
im trying to change where you first start out but im not sure what file to open?
or if anyone has a small tut can you just pm me?

item.title: What file do i open to change where you start out when you first log in?
item.dc:creator: @sonic_dude sonic_dude
item.description:
@sonic_dude wrote:

ok thanks your a big help, if i have any more questions ill pm you, i just need to know about portals later on but thats it

Read full topic

item.title: What file do i open to change where you start out when you first log in?
item.dc:creator: @ancientday ancientday
item.description:
@ancientday wrote:

go to client.java

0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH

AddGlobalObject(objectX, objectY, NewObjectID, int Face 10);

AddGlobalObject(2905, 3612, 2153, 0, 10);//fire orb

now if you cant figure out where to change this stuff just play the game not make it

Read full topic

item.title: What file do i open to change where you start out when you first log in?
item.dc:creator: @d3adp00l d3adp00l
item.description:
@d3adp00l wrote:

this is what hes talking about it will look like this:
[size=8pt]// initial x and y coordinates of the player
heightLevel = 0;
// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
teleportToX = 2978;//Player start point, Right now it’s in black knight’s lair
teleportToY = 3613;//Narbmark: Player start point[/size]
just on mine where it says 2978 and 3613 just replace with what cords u want ur new players to start off at…

Read full topic

item.title: What file do i open to change where you start out when you first log in?
item.dc:creator: @ancientday ancientday
item.description:
@ancientday wrote:

open up player.java

ctrl f teleportToX

then change the coords
